articles.author: Kelly Tyko
articles.title: McDonald's bringing back Spicy Chicken McNuggets, Mighty Hot Sauce for a limited time starting Feb. 1 - USA TODAY
articles.description: McDonald's Spicy Chicken McNuggets are coming back starting Feb. 1 for a limited time. Get a free 6-piece on McDelivery with DoorDash orders.

articles.author: Jordan Valinsky, CNN Business
articles.title: Google Maps will soon display Covid-19 vaccination sites - CNN
articles.description: Google Maps will soon display locations that offer Covid-19 vaccinations, further bolstering awareness of the virus — and how to avoid it.
